name: Spire | Browser Version
description:
Based off the DyingMMOJam for the submission Spire, but for browser.

The download version will still likely play the best, but to make things a little easier for access, here is a browser version. I'm not including it on the main game jam submission, as this one will likely end up getting altered a bit later for better browser support.

if you would like to see the original page: Spire

*EDIT: Currently plays significantly better with a controller for the browser version (if you have trouble with the mouse via the browser player)

WASD to move

Mouse to look

Left mouse: shoot

Right mouse: aim

Scroll down: swap guns

ESC: menu

p.s.s. There will be bugs
